episodes.synopsis: When high schooler Todd Tolanski starts exhibiting toad-like mutant powers, Mystique sees a perfect opportunity to get a spy into Xavier's institute.
episodes.title: Strategy X

episodes.synopsis: When Kitty Pryde discovers her mutant ability to phase through objects, she's naturally frightened and confused. That's when the X-Men step in.
episodes.title: The X Impulse

episodes.synopsis: After a young mutant named Rogue touches a fellow student and absorbs his energy and memories, she runs away from home, confused and frightened.
episodes.title: Rogue Recruit

episodes.synopsis: When hothead Fred Dukes starts his first day of school, his girth and equally massive temper make him one of the least popular guys in town.
episodes.title: Mutant Crush

episodes.synopsis: When Storm's nephew, Spyke, begins to develop his mutant powers, he decides he'd rather use his unusual abilities for revenge.
episodes.title: Speed and Spyke

episodes.synopsis: When Rogue and Nightcrawler stumble upon the abandoned lab of a mutant called Forge, Nightcrawler is accidentally sucked into another dimension.
episodes.title: Middleverse

episodes.synopsis: While on a school geology field trip, Scott and Rogue realize that the schoolmates they thought they could trust have other plans.
episodes.title: Turn of the Rogue

episodes.synopsis: For a school project, Spyke gets a video camera to document life as a teenager.
episodes.title: SpykeCam

episodes.synopsis: Away from the institute, the X-Men are thrown in a survival training boot camp with the Brotherhood.
episodes.title: Survival of the Fittest

episodes.synopsis: When Rogue starts to dream about Nightcrawler's past, she becomes curious about their origin.
episodes.title: Shadowed Past

episodes.synopsis: When a strange news broadcast triggers a computer chip in Wolverine's brain, he begins to have unusual fits of rage.
episodes.title: Grim Reminder

episodes.synopsis: Professor Xavier and Cyclops discover that Alex Summers -- Havok -- is in fact alive and well.
episodes.title: The Cauldron: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Magneto holds multiple battles to find out which mutants are "worthy" of joining him on Asteroid M.
episodes.title: The Cauldron: Part 2

video.title: X-Men: Evolution
video.synopsis: This series captures X-Men favorites as teenagers, learning to master their mutant under the guidance of Professor X or archrival Magneto.
